wikipedia_page.main: Robert Haworth (26 June 1897 – 1962) was an English footballer best known for playing for Bolton Wanderers, for whom he made over 300 appearances in The Football League. He played for the team in the 1923, 1926 and 1929 FA Cup Finals.

response: Competing with Bob Haworth and Alex Finney, Walker found his chances limited and moved to Third Division North side Barrow the following year.
Robert, Rob or Bob Haworth may refer to:
* Bob Haworth (1897–1962), footballer who played for Bolton Wanderers in three FA Cup Finals in the 1920s
